Uses of Interface
com.tangosol.util.fsm.ExecutionContext

Packages that use ExecutionContext
Package
Description
com.tangosol.util.fsm
Contains Finite state machine interfaces.

  • Uses of ExecutionContext in com.tangosol.util.fsm

    Classes in com.tangosol.util.fsm that implement ExecutionContext
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    NonBlockingFiniteStateMachine<S extends Enum<S>>
    An NonBlockingFiniteStateMachine is a specialized FiniteStateMachine implementation that performs transitions asynchronously to the threads that request state changes.

    Event.getDesiredState(S state, ExecutionContext context)
